scripts.watch:all: parallelshell " npm run sass" "npm run lite"
scripts.makefiles: mkdir dist && cd dist && mkdir src
scripts.usemin: usemin client/src/index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/src/index.html && usemin client/src/about.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/src/about.html && usemin client/src/navigation.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/src/navigation.html && usemin client/src/agenda.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/src/agenda.html && usemin client/src/highlights.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/src/highlights.html && usemin client/src/members.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/src/members.html && usemin client/src/profile.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/src/profile.html && usemin client/src/roles.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/src/roles.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run makefiles && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
